response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its high quality and versatile applications, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its exceptional worth, I propose a price of $10,000 for this product. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss this further with you.", "product_price": 10000}
